command.name: peer

parameter.name: addr
parameter.description: IP address of the new neighbor

command.abstract: add a new neighbor to a BGP router

description.p: This command adds a new neighbor to one BGP router. The new neighbor has the address addr and belongs to the domain with ASN as-num. This command also configures for this neighbor default input and output filters that will accept any route. See the bgp router peer filterbgp_router_peer_filter for more information about the route filters.
